title: mystery gift box
body:
Hello 

just log into my account today  and i did  recieve a mystery gift box for my good beheave but apparently when i went to check the skin was nothing.... someone can help out ?

replies.body: i try that but when I select blitz it doenst show that skin. really weird
Could be a bug in the store. Are you able to set up a custom game and select the skin?

Are you saying you got the skin but you cant seem to find it on your account?

-SumCoolAid

yes exactly like that i cant see the skin it was blitzcrank goalkeeper and I went to check but nothing, actually that skin is not there
 i was so happy about it until i check :(  u,u
